B

bounceOff(Particle) - Method in class Particle
Updates the velocities of this and that particle acccording to the laws of elastic collision.
bounceOffHorizontalWall() - Method in class Particle
Updates the velocity of this particle upon collision with a Horizontal wall.
bounceOffVerticalWall() - Method in class Particle
Updates the velocity of this particle upon collision with a Vertical wall.

C

CollisionSystem - Class in <Unnamed>
The 2D-N-Particle Elastic collision simulator class.
CollisionSystem(Particle[]) - Constructor for class CollisionSystem
Constructs the simulator class with given array of particles.
count() - Method in class Particle
Returns the total number of collisions involving this particle.

D

draw() - Method in class Particle
Draws this particle to the Standard Draw.

K

kineticEnergy() - Method in class Particle
Returns the kinetic energy of this particle.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class CollisionSystem
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Particle
For unit testing of the class Particle.java
move(double) - Method in class Particle
Move this particle on a straight with its velocity for specified time.

P

Particle - Class in <Unnamed>
The Particle class represents a particle moving in the unit box, with given position, velocity, radius, and mass.
Particle() - Constructor for class Particle
Initializes a particle with random position and velocity.
Particle(double, double, double, double, double, double, Color) - Constructor for class Particle
Initializes a Particle with given specified parameters.

R

radiusUpscalingEnabled() - Static method in class Particle
Returns true if radius upscaling is enabled.

S

setDefaultColor(Color) - Method in class Particle
Set new default color for randomly generated particles.
setRedrawHZ(double) - Method in class CollisionSystem
Sets the number of redraw events per second.
simulate(double) - Method in class CollisionSystem
Simulates the system of particles for the given amount of time limit using Event driven programming.

T

timeToHit(Particle) - Method in class Particle
Returns the time required by this particle to collide with that particle.
timeToHitHorizontalWall() - Method in class Particle
Returns the time until this particle hits a Horizontal wall assuming no Intervening collision.
timeToHitVerticalWall() - Method in class Particle
Returns the time until this particle hits a Vertical swall assuming no Intervening collision.

U

useDoubleBuffering(boolean) - Static method in class CollisionSystem
A switch for a setting for the StdDraw library, may improve frame-rates during simulation.
useRadiusUpscaling(boolean) - Static method in class Particle
If this setting is turned on, small sized particles are upscaled to minimum observable radius onscreen which otherwise might be invisible due to extremely small size.
